alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Pondera; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:29PM MDT until July 08 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Pondera County in north central Montana... Southwestern Liberty County in north central Montana... Southeastern Toole County in north central Montana... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 529 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southwest of Lothair, or 18 miles southeast of Shelby, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tiber Dam. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
